# ACK 的操作系统

## Alibaba Cloud Linux 3.2104 LTS 64位 容器优化版（默认）

```bash
[root@iZbp16qq4fgg0o7ecm6hm1Z ~]# cat /etc/os-release
NAME="Alibaba Cloud Linux"
VERSION="3 (OpenAnolis Edition)"
ID="alinux"
ID_LIKE="rhel fedora centos anolis"
VERSION_ID="3"
VARIANT="OpenAnolis Edition"
VARIANT_ID="openanolis"
ALINUX_MINOR_ID="2104"
ALINUX_UPDATE_ID="12"
PLATFORM_ID="platform:al8"
PRETTY_NAME="Alibaba Cloud Linux 3.2104 U12 (OpenAnolis Edition)"
ANSI_COLOR="0;31"
HOME_URL="https://www.aliyun.com/"
[root@iZbp16qq4fgg0o7ecm6hm1Z ~]# uname -a
Linux iZbp16qq4fgg0o7ecm6hm1Z 5.10.134-19.1.al8.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Jun 25 10:21:27 CST 2025 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
